Articles.Content:
Hi,

does anyone know of a problem that causes your craft to always pitch up?

I built a rover an minmus (using EPL) and everything was going fine... until at some point it started reversing and when I disabled the motors on the wheels it started pitching up. A look at the the pitch-indicator in the bottem left corner tells me that the craft is pitching up all the time. Unless I manually pitch down... but as soon as I let go of the "W"-key it goes back.

Any Ideas?
